== Usage ==

The meter max attribute specifies the upper bound of the range.

== Values ==

The meter max attribute must be a [http://www.whatwg.org/specs/web-apps/current-work/multipage/infrastructure.html#valid-floating-point-number valid floating point number].

== Elements ==

You can use the `max` attribute on the following elements:

  * [MeterElement <meter>]
  * [ProgressElement <progress>]
